group_1.textCenter: (I guess they're getting a bit impatient...)
I should get out of here before they notice me...

group_1.textLeft: I went and took a quick sneak peek over at @Torayamachi.
And it's just like you and Ranka said.
Even though it's only been a few days, they look @really stressed out.

group_1.textRight: Told you~

group_1.textLeft: This really isn't Juri the Great's kind of thing, though.

group_1.textRight: But having this time helps us a lot too~
Because we can look deeper into what they're up to~

group_1.textLeft: Yuna's pawns won't talk, though.

group_1.textRight: So we just take more time to look into it~

group_1.textLeft: Whatever...

group_1.textRight: But no more peeking, okay?~

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Why not?

group_1.textRight: You got lucky today, but all it takes is one slip up and you'll be caught and killed. Bad End.
You know that, right?~

group_1.textLeft: That's none of your business.
If they find me, I'll just burn them to a crisp.

group_1.textRight: You should act more like a leader...

group_1.textLeft: Ranka should be hitting me up any time now.

group_1.textRight: Do you have her doing something?

group_1.textLeft: There's this seventh grader on my team.
She's been officially found guilty.
And we were waiting until the right moment to catch her.
Speak of the devil...
So, you really did it?

group_1.textRight: I'm... so sorry...

group_1.textLeft: Crying won't get you anywhere. I want to hear the whole story.
Now look me in the eye and tell me... @why did you steal our Grief Seeds?

group_1.textRight: Juri, you have to handle this delicately.

group_1.textLeft: I've got this.

group_1.textRight: I wanted to... help my friends...

group_1.textLeft: Where are your friends?

group_1.textRight: To-Torayamachi... @Everyone's stressed out over there...

group_1.textLeft: A Torayamachi girl stealing our Grief Seeds while @they're claiming that witches are returning...
What you've done totally disproves what they @claimed.
What are you going to do to me...?
Look me in the eyes... and tell me their plan against @us.

group_1.textRight: If I do, will you let me go?

group_1.textLeft: Just tell me.

group_1.textRight: ... we're setting gems on the West and East bridges to get you to go through the middle.

group_1.textLeft: So Yuna thinks we're going to use those two bridges, huh.
Well, that sounds like what she would do.

group_1.textRight: Will you please let me go now...?

group_1.textLeft: You just sold out your friends. Why would I let a @traitor like you live on?

group_1.textRight: But you said yo-...

group_1.textLeft: When did Juri the Great ever say she'd let you go?
You're going to be food for us.

group_1.textRight: Wait!

group_1.textLeft: What, Ao? Don't stick your nose into this.

group_1.textRight: Her gem was just purified, so it’s not like she's going @to become a witch anytime soon.

group_1.textLeft: Then I'll just roast her.
If I burn her, and she heals, and I burn her, and she heals...

group_1.textRight: No...

group_1.textLeft: She'll run out of magical power eventually. Well, @her mind will probably break long before that.
Would you rather be rare or well done?
Heh.
I'm kidding, I'm kidding. @I hope you learned your lesson.

group_1.textRight: NOOOOOOOOO!!!

group_1.textLeft: What the...!? Come on, are you serious!?

group_1.textRight: I told you to handle this delicately...!
... What do we do now?

group_1.textLeft: Even if she isn't one of us, I wasn't going to kill her...
The best we can do is mourn her, I guess?

group_1.textRight: I'm going to give you a Game Over...

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: I was talking about the witch~
